segments.text: I've heard The Hitchhiker would be on next week . I want to see it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I love horror movies the most . Would you like to go with me next weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No way . I will be scared out of my wits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , What kind of movies do you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Er , let me see . Romance , comedy , documentary , action , science fiction , cartoon and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In a word , you like all the movies except for the horror movies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , It seems like we don't talk the same language as far as movies are concerned .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not quite . I also like romance and comedy movies very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Terminal is a movie of this type .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I could hardly wait to see it .
segments.speaker: S2
